entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
